---
title: "Schedule"
---

```{r}
#| label: setup
#| include: false
library(tidyverse)
library(flextable)
library(ftExtra)
```

```{r}
#| label: schedule_data
#| include: false

schedule_data <- tribble(
        ~Week, ~Date, ~methods, ~applied, ~comp,
        1, "2/6", "Introduction", "", "Introduction to `R`",
        1, "2/8", "Logic of Experiments", "", "`R` Basics",
        2, "2/13", "Data Visualziation", "Intergroup Prejudice", "`ggplot2` Basics",
        2, "2/15", "Estimation", "Intergroup Prejudice", "Data Wrangling with `dplyr`",
        3, "2/22", "Sampling Distributions", "Political Participation", "Functions",
        4, "2/27", "Randomization Inference", "Partisanship vs Ideology", "Iteration",
        4, "2/29", "Large Sample Inference", "Partisanship vs Ideology", "Statistics Functions",
        5, "3/5", "Measurement", "Changing Political Beliefs", "Data Types and Recoding Data",
        5, "3/7", "Measurement", "Changing Political Beliefs", "Data Types and Recoding Data",
        6, "3/12", "Experimental Design: Stratification", "Combatting Electoral Fraud", "`randomizr` package",
        6, "3/14", "Experimental Design: Clustering", "Combatting Electoral Fraud", "`randomizr` package",
        7, "3/19", "Statistical Power", "Authoritarian Censorship", "Simulations",
        7, "3/21", "Choosing Experimental Designs", "Authoritarian Censorship", "Simulations",
        8, "4/2", "Linear Models and Experiments", "", "Linear Modeling with `lm`",
        8, "4/4", "Covariate Adjustment", "", "`estimatr` package"
)

```

```{r}
#| label: schedule
#| tbl-cap: Course Schedule

flextable(schedule_data) |>
        set_header_labels(
                methods = "Methods Topic",
                applied = "Applied Topic",
                comp = "Computing Topic"
        ) |>
        bold(part = "header") |>
        merge_v(j = ~ Week + applied + applied + comp) |>
        valign(j = ~Week, valign = "center") |>
        align(j = ~Week, align = "center") |>
        hline(i = c(2, 4, 5, 7, 9, 11, 13)) |>
        colformat_md() |>
        fix_border_issues() |>
        autofit()
```
